item.title: Algebra 4: Groups and Rings Notes
item.description: Here are my notes for the UCL course Algebra 4: Groups and Rings based on lectures by Yusra Naqvi. All mistakes are my own and all pieces of insight are hers. Some parts of the course are glossed over or only brief touched upon within these notes as they are written assuming the reader has taken a course in Number Theory. Download
